title: Is this the picture of the broken and colored Lady Mitch McConnell?
subtitle: The majority leader of the U.S. Senate, Mitch McConnell, became the subject of speculation after the photographs showed that his hands appeared to be bruised and colorful.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A picture distributed by AP shows the majority leader of the Senate Mitch McConnell looking bruised and colorful.
